h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: When you stumble upon a blue, glowing enemy and defeat them, you have a chance to get a Mind Core. They aren't as common as Blood of the Iron Bull's but these enemies do possess them occasionally. These enemies will also drop their Spirit for you to claim, so be sure to seek them out in our Spirit Locations guide.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 1'.
The content is as follows:
When you stumble upon a blue, glowing enemy and defeat them, you have a chance to get a Mind Core. They aren't as common as Blood of the Iron Bull's but these enemies do possess them occasionally. These enemies will also drop their Spirit for you to claim, so be sure to seek them out in our Spirit Locations guide.
